events.comment: counts up the seconds of play

events.comment: amount of time in seconds it takes for boss to arrive

children.text: spawn powerups when there are no enemies

children.name: shooter
children.comment: index of boss segment that is spawning and enemy

functionParameters.name: type
functionParameters.comment: 0: wide, 1: rapid, 2: shield, 3: bomb, 4: clone, -1: random

children.text: animation frames larger than 0 are used for the power ups. 1: wide, 2: rapid, 3: shield, 4: bomb, 5: clone
move it to appear as if the boss of level 5 is spawning it

children.functionDescription: called whenever a boss has been defeated

events.text: this reactivates the boss after a wave of enemies on level 5
